Description: Year for which to retrieve cost assumptions of ``data/costs.csv``.
Default discount rate if not specified for a technology in ``data/costs.csv``.
Exchange rate from USD :math:`_{2013}` to EUR :math:`_{2013}` from `ECB <https://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/exchange/eurofxref/html/eurofxref-graph-usd.en.html>`_

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``data/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, assumptions about their capital investment costs are set to the corresponding value. Optional; overwrites cost assumptions from ``data/costs.csv``.

Values: Keys should be in the 'technology' column of ``data/costs.csv``. Values can be any float.
Description: For the given technologies, assumptions about their marginal operating costs are set to the corresponding value. Optional; overwrites cost assumptions from ``data/costs.csv``.
Specify exogenous prices for emission types listed in ``network.carriers`` to marginal costs.

Exogenous price of carbon-dioxide added to the marginal costs of fossil-fuelled generators according to their carbon intensity. Added through the keyword ``Ep`` in the ``{opts}`` wildcard only in the rule :mod:`prepare_network``.
